trans-unit.source: Azure AD and Applications: Assigning Users to an Application | Microsoft Azure
trans-unit.target: Azure AD and Applications: Assigning Users to an Application | Microsoft Azure

trans-unit.source: How to implement user assignment for Azure applications.
trans-unit.target: How to implement user assignment for Azure applications.

trans-unit.source: Azure AD and Applications: Assigning Users to an Application
trans-unit.target: Azure AD and Applications: Assigning Users to an Application

trans-unit.source: Before you can assign users and groups to an application, you must require user assignment.
trans-unit.target: Before you can assign users and groups to an application, you must require user assignment.

trans-unit.source: To learn how to require user assignment please see the [Requiring User Assignment](active-directory-applications-guiding-developers-requiring-user-assignment.md) article.
trans-unit.target: To learn how to require user assignment please see the [Requiring User Assignment](active-directory-applications-guiding-developers-requiring-user-assignment.md) article.

trans-unit.source: Log in to the Azure portal with an administrator account.
trans-unit.target: Log in to the Azure portal with an administrator account.

trans-unit.source: Click on the **All Items** item in the main menu.
trans-unit.target: Click on the **All Items** item in the main menu.

trans-unit.source: Choose the directory you are using for the application.
trans-unit.target: Choose the directory you are using for the application.

trans-unit.source: Select the application from the list of applications associated with this directory.
trans-unit.target: Select the application from the list of applications associated with this directory.

trans-unit.source: Select the users you want to assign to the application.
trans-unit.target: Select the users you want to assign to the application.
